item.title: East Guwahati Police District (EGPD) team nabbed two extortionists
item.description: East Guwahati Police District (EGPD) team nabbed two extortionists A team of the east Guwahati Police District (EGPD) from the Basistha Police Sttaion arrested two miscreants for trying to extort from Magic drivers

item.title: Sadou Asam Karmachari Parishad (SAKP) backs tomorrow's anti- NPS (National Pension System) stir
item.description: Sadou Asam Karmachari Parishad (SAKP) backs tomorrow’s anti- NPS (National Pension System) stir SAKP president Dipen Sarma and secretary-general Dilip Kalita said that the Centre had introduced the NPS in January, 2004 and the State Government implemented in February, 2005.

item.title: Two stolen bikes recovered in Assam's Dispur
item.description: Two stolen bikes recovered in Assam’s Dispur The police got the lead from the confessional statement of Mirjul Ali who was arrested earlier, Mirjul hails from Tamulpur.

item.title: All Assam Students' Union (AASU) to pay homage to Indian playback singer from Assam Late Dr Bhupen Hazarika
item.description: All Assam Students' Union (AASU) to pay homage to Indian playback singer from Assam Late Dr Bhupen Hazarika STAFF REPORTERGUWAHATI: The AASU (All Assam Students' Union) will pay homage to Dr Bhupen Hazarika centrally at Dighalupukhuripar on November 5, his death anniversary.

item.title: We want an alliance with Congress, says All India United Democratic Front (AIUDF) president Badruddin Ajmal
item.description: We want an alliance with Congress, says All India United Democratic Front (AIUDF) president Badruddin Ajmal Ajmal said, "

item.title: 108 Mritunjay Emergency Response Services (MERS) attends to 20,165 traffic accidents in state from Jan to Sept
item.description: 108 Mritunjay Emergency Response Services (MERS) attends to 20,165 traffic accidents in state from Jan to Sept Kamrup topped the list with the highest number of 2132 accidents while the lowest number of 86 accidents took place in the Dima Hasao district during the period

item.title: Stolen bikes recovered from Meghalaya
item.description: Stolen bikes recovered from Meghalaya A team of the East Guwahati Police District (EGPD), with the help of the Meghalaya Police, on Tuesday recovered and brought back two stolen motorcycles

item.title: Assam Rail Passengers'Association moves PM Modi for resuming train services
item.description: Assam Rail Passengers’Association moves PM Modi for resuming train services After making repeated requests to the Railway authority, MPs, the CM of Assam & PM Modi, the ARPA has once again knocked on the door of the Prime Minister to seek resumption of local trains of the State that were stopped due to the Covid-19 pandemic.

item.title: Myanmarese supari seized; eight held in Guwahati
item.description: Myanmarese supari seized; eight held in Guwahati A team of EGPD from the Hatigaon Police Station, along with Basistha Police Station intercepted three cars at the Basistha crossing and seized suspected Myanmarese supari

item.title: Powers workers to join anti-National Pension System stir in State
item.description: Powers workers to join anti-National Pension System stir in State ASESWU has announced that it will take part in the padayatra organized by the AAGNPSEA on November 8 in support of replacing the NPS (National Pension System) with the OPS

item.title: One held for theft by West Guwahati Police District
item.description: One held for theft by West Guwahati Police District A West Guwahati Police District (WGPD) surprise naka party from Bharalumukh and Jalukbari PS arrested one Sajid Ahmed of Garigaon

item.title: Gold biscuits seized, one arrested by Government Railway Police
item.description: Gold biscuits seized, one arrested by Government Railway Police Government Railway Police (GRP) on Tuesday arrested a person who was trying to smuggle gold biscuits.

item.title: CID, Assam Police arrest OC of Dhula PS for extending undue favour to accused
item.description: CID, Assam Police arrest OC of Dhula PS for extending undue favour to accused The Criminal Investigation Department (CID), Assam Police, on Tuesday arrested the Officer in-charge (OC) of Dhula Police Station

item.title: Vigilance Awareness Week, 2022 observed at PHQ, Narangi
item.description: Vigilance Awareness Week, 2022 observed at PHQ, Narangi Keeping in line with the directives of Central Vigilance Commission (CVC), Oil India Limited is observing Vigilance Awareness week at the Pipeline Headquarters (PHQ), Narangi

item.title: Minister Jayanta Mallabaruah addresses issues faced by private ITIs
item.description: Minister Jayanta Mallabaruah addresses issues faced by private ITIs Skill Entrepreneurship and Employment Department Minister Jayanta Mallabaruah called a meeting with the authorities of private ITIs at the Assam Administrative Staff College

item.title: Assam Government suspended corrupt ACS officer Kisan Kumar Sharma
item.description: Assam Government suspended corrupt ACS officer Kisan Kumar Sharma The State Government on Monday placed under suspension Kisan Kumar Sharma (ACS)

item.title: Assam Governor Prof Jagdish Mukhi greets people on Chhath Puja
item.description: Assam Governor Prof Jagdish Mukhi greets people on Chhath Puja Mukhi said, â€œI extend my heartiest greetings to the people all across the State on the pious occasion of Chhath Puja where people offer prayers to Sun God.

item.title: One electrocuted to death in Demow Palengi
item.description: One electrocuted to death in Demow Palengi A tragic incident took place in Demow Palengi 10 no line on Tuesday morning when a youth was electrocuted to death.
